title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST-style API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) exposing Ollama models as LangChain LLMs & embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model, packaged as a Docker container.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Maven Central artifact ‘io.github.amithkoujalgi:ollama4j’.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem (RubyGems: ollama) for chatting and embedding with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration (PyPI: ollama-haystack) exposing Ollama models as Haystack generators & embedders.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app (Next.js) that talks to Ollama via the REST API.

title: ollama-ts
summary: Community TypeScript client with stricter types and tree-shakable ESM build.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library (NuGet: Ollama) supporting chat, completion, and embeddings.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image sources and compose examples for running Ollama containerized with GPU support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama, LangChain, and Chroma.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that integrates Ollama models into Slack threads and DMs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete and summarization using Ollama.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Experimental Zig client library for Ollama with async I/O.
